topic.title: Maintenance Tasks: FT07
topic.shortdesc: Maintenance Tasks are all tasks related to Digital Banking solution software maintenance and may refers to bank employee Software Operator or Admin Role or delegated to Finshape maintenance service.

body.p: Today, mature tooling, such as package management or provisioning tools, covers the installation and deployment of applications. Software operators cover configuration, updating, scaling, running backups or performing health checks.
